scripts.with-react: yarn add -D react@latest react-dom@latest react-hook-form@latest react-number-format@latest prop-types@latest @svgr/webpack@latest eslint-plugin-react@latest mobx@latest mobx-react-lite@latest clsx@latest run-func@latest && node utils/with/react.js
scripts.with-react-ts: yarn add -D react@latest react-dom@latest react-hook-form@latest react-number-format@latest prop-types@latest @svgr/webpack@latest eslint-plugin-react@latest mobx@latest mobx-react-lite@latest clsx@latest typescript@latest ts-loader@latest @types/react@latest @types/react-dom@latest @types/lodash@latest run-func@latest && node utils/with/react.js && node utils/with/ts.js
scripts.with-ts: yarn add -D typescript@latest ts-loader@latest && node utils/with/ts.js
scripts.with-vue: yarn add -D vue@latest vuex@latest vue-router@latest vue-loader@latest eslint-plugin-vue@latest && node utils/with/vue.js
scripts.with-vue-ts: yarn add -D vue@latest vuex@latest vue-router@latest vue-loader@latest eslint-plugin-vue@latest @vue/tsconfig@latest typescript@latest ts-loader@latest && node utils/with/vue.js && node utils/with/ts.js
scripts.with-vue-plus: yarn add -D vue3-perfect-scrollbar@latest vue3-carousel@latest vue-flatpickr-component@latest vue-imask@latest vue-recaptcha-v3@latest
